title: Replace Meraki logo asset across site surfaces

requirements.summary: Swap the existing Meraki logo with the provided logo.png while keeping all existing references (header, footer, and Open Graph image) pointing to the generated static asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` is replaced/updated to match the uploaded `logo.png` (optimized as needed for web use).
The header logo in `frontend/src/features/landing/HeaderNav.tsx` visually shows the new logo.
The footer logo in `frontend/src/features/landing/Footer.tsx` visually shows the new logo.
The Open Graph image meta tag in `frontend/index.html` continues to point to `/assets/generated/meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` and renders the new logo when the page is shared.
No backend changes are required for this update.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing generated logo file with an optimized PNG derived from the uploaded `logo.png`, preserving the exact filename `meraki-logo.dim_1024x1024.png` so all existing references in the header (`frontend/src/features/landing/HeaderNav.tsx`), footer (`frontend/src/features/landing/Footer.tsx`), and Open Graph metadata (`frontend/index.html`) continue to work without code changes.
